segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is while the sink is overflowing right next to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already forming a big puddle on the floor, and she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's just really focused or completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is so determined to get those cookies that he doesn't see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching him balance like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely trusting her brother not to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will be really upset when she finally turns around and sees the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy, which makes the scene inside seem even more chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the contrast between the peaceful outside and the chaos inside is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
